attributes.action: stop dr lyn evans switching on particle accelerator on this wed 10 sept
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this man has no right to experiment with the peoples planet.this could be the destruction of everything.he doesnt know what the results of such an experiment would be otherwise he wouldnt bother doing it.if saddam hussein had been planning such a thing the worlds forces would have hunted him down and destroyed him. anyone involved should be at least stopped and detained and all research should also be destroyed.as far as I'm concerned these are lunatics who are following a mad selfish desire to satisfy their own curiosity.What use can this kind of experiment ever be.We still have not learnt our lessons of splitting the atom.Something of this enormity should be dealt with by the highest powers and I am begging if you dont do anything worthwhile for the rest of your life you at least have done something to save our planet,never mind global warming there would be nothing left to warm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
